Coverage. Bug with formatted markdown after embed
.
@[youtube](dQw4w9WgXcQ)
*foo*
.
<p><div class="embed-responsive embed-responsive-16by9 ratio ratio-16x9"><iframe class="embed-responsive-item youtube-player" width="640" height="390" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dQw4w9WgXcQ" allowfullscreen></iframe></div><em>foo</em></p>
.
Security. HTML in URL
.
@[youtube](<a href="example.com">dQw4w9WgXcQ</a>)
*foo*
.
<p><div class="embed-responsive embed-responsive-16by9 ratio ratio-16x9"><iframe class="embed-responsive-item youtube-player" width="640" height="390" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/&lt;a href=&quot;example.com&quot;&gt;dQw4w9WgXcQ&lt;/a&gt;" allowfullscreen></iframe></div><em>foo</em></p>
.
